name: Duck O Colour
description:
Shoot Paintballs at ducks!

  • The ducks are all white and would like to be painted different colours.
  • You only have the three primary colours, red, blue and yellow.
  • Can you colour the ducks correctly by using only those three colours?
  • Original game play.
  • Hints that show you which colours to shoot - turn them off for an extra challenge!
  • 15 levels with 5 waves each level.
  • Colour each duck perfectly for gold.
  • Replay any level to get gold.
  • Colours are randomly chosen, the game will be different each time you play!
  • Three levels of difficulty that determine:
    • The speed of the paint guns;
    • The number of rounds the paint guns rotate.

Although this game is only in English there is a full Russian translation of the game controls and tutorial available on my website - once you can see how to play, you don't need language to play it. Russian Translation

Duck O Colour - game demo for Android devices from Evolutionary Games on Vimeo.

If you like this game, my game Tricky Tapped Toppings took this concept to a whole new level.
